title: Cold Brew Coffee 101 : Understand the benefits and learn simple recipes and brewing methods
description: You are about to discover why the cold brew coffee craze has swept across the world, as well as the history of cold brew coffee, the benefits of drinking cold brew coffee, various cold brewing methods, and cold brew coffee recipes. Whether you are a cold brew coffee aficionado or have only just begun to enjoy its unique flavor, which is unlike hot coffee, iced coffee, or any other beverage that you have ever consumed, you will find value in this book.Download your copy today!
author: Joe C. Evans
